Jennie Amon

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Jane Amon; Ammon; Amen
  2. Foster Name: Jennie
  3. Foster Family: Walter Reeson
  4. Location of Family: West Point, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: West Point, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 10
  8. Date of Birth: 1900, NY
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Jennie Jones
  11. Spouse Name: Harry Jones
  12. Source: Cuming Democrat, 29 October 1909; West Point Republican, 29 October 1909; 1920 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex; "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm.
